title: Sum of a series
htmlDescription: Compute the nth term of a series, i.e. the sum of the n first terms of the corresponding sequence. Informally this value, or its limit when n tends to infinity, is also called the sum of the series, thus the title of this task. For this task, use: $S_n = \displaystyle\sum_{k=1}^n \frac{1}{k^2}$.
